mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (userId, postId, content, secret, parentId) VALUES (#{user.id}, #{post.id}, #{content}, #{secret}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, c.secret, c.parentId, c.createdAt, u.id AS userId, u.username, p.id AS postId FROM Comment c LEFT JOIN User u ON c.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN Post p on c.postId = p.id WHERE c.id=#{commentId} GROUP BY c.id, c.content, c.secret, c.parentId, c.createdAt, u.id, u.username, p.id ORDER BY c.createdAt;

SELECT c.id, c.content, c.secret, c.parentId, c.createdAt, u.id AS userId, u.username FROM Comment c LEFT JOIN User u ON c.userId = u.id WHERE c.postId=#{postId} GROUP BY c.id, c.content, c.secret, c.parentId, c.createdAt, u.id, u.username ORDER BY c.createdAt LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Comment WHERE postId = #{postId};
mapper.update: UPDATE Comment SET content=#{content}, secret=#{secret}, parentId=#{parentId} WHERE id=#{id}
